calculateAndSetMilliSecondsPerGen(int) - Static method in class model.GifCreator
Converts genPerSec to milliseconds to work with lieng.GIFWriter before applying it to milliSecPerGen.
calculateBoardSize(double, double) - Method in class model.Board
Adds new rows to the board array if the new cell sizes set makes the board not fully cover the canvas, in order to auto-fill the board.
calculateBoardSize(double, double) - Method in class model.DynamicBoard
Adds new rows to the board array if the new cell sizes set makes the board not fully cover the canvas, in order to auto-fill the board.
calculateBoardSize(double, double) - Method in class model.StaticBoard
Adds new rows to the board array if the new cell sizes set makes the board not fully cover the canvas, in order to auto-fill the board.
calculateCanvasWidth(int) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
A function used to calculate the appropriate canvas size in case the dimensions of the board changes.
calculateCellSize(Canvas, int, int) - Method in class controller.FileEditorController
Calculates the size each cells needs to have in order to fit in the canvas the method gets as input.
calculateCellSize() - Method in class controller.GifCreatorController
Calculates the size each cell needs to have in order to fit the entire board in the preview canvas.
calculateCellSize() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Re-evaluates an appropriate cellsize if a new board pattern is loaded.
calculateCellSizeFromSlider(int, int, double, double, Slider, TextArea) - Static method in class model.GoL
Calculates a cellsize and snaps it to the nearest possible value that would fit in the canvas perfectly based on the horizontal size.

cellClickEvent(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Kills or gives birth to a cell when clicked.
cellDrag(MouseEvent, GraphicsContext, Canvas) - Method in class model.Board
Functionally the same as cellClick. visitedCellWithDrag is an array which contains the board coordinates of the last visited cell, in order to avoid multiple re-calculations of the cell currently targeted by the mouse pointer.
cellDrag(MouseEvent, GraphicsContext, Canvas) - Method in class model.DynamicBoard
Functionally the same as cellClick. visitedCellWithDrag is an array which contains the board coordinates of the last visited cell, in order to avoid multiple re-calculations of the cell currently targeted by the mouse pointer.
cellDrag(MouseEvent, GraphicsContext, Canvas) - Method in class model.StaticBoard
Functionally the same as cellClick. visitedCellWithDrag is an array which contains the board coordinates of the last visited cell, in order to avoid multiple re-calculations of the cell currently targeted by the mouse pointer.
